p: The study presented data on the concentrations of fatty acid, phospholipid and phytosterol compositions of Haematostaphis barteri pulp and seed oils. Some physicoâ€“chemical parameters were also presented. There was a clear indication that the pulp and seed oils contained a high level of polyunsaturated fatty acids, making them a healthy low fat food. It was also revealed that both sample oils may be developed into a commercial product for use in food products.
